outputs.output_descr: The overall aim of the project is to achieve the national goal of a "better life for all", in line with the Province's own vision of an Eastern Cape as a compelling place in which to live, work and invest, with integrated and balanced development.  The project will assist with service delivery optimisation through technical cooperation, access to global expertise and best practices, and project management support.  UNVs will be deployed to carry out this support within the provincial Department of Local Government, Housing and Traditional Affairs and Mbizana municipalty in the Eastern Cape.
outputs.output_title: Cap Dev for CD-PGA in Eastern

project_title: Cap Dev for CD-PGA in Eastern Cape
